977170.name: Capsa - Vehicle Raider Pack
977170.description:
The Capsa - Vehicle Raider Pack includes a selection of items to enable you to begin customizing your vehicles.

This pack of cosmetic items contains 4 tires, 4 rims, 4 steering wheels, 4 vehicle kits and 16 hood ornaments for Ground Vehicles. It also contains a War Mask for horse mounts.

Items included in the pack are as follows:
  • Dragonfly Raider Kit
  • Enforcer Raider Kit
  • Raptor Raider Kit
  • Warrior Raider Kit
  • Raider Tire Bundle 1
  • Vehicle Raider Steering Wheel Bundle 1
  • Vehicle Raider Rim Bundle 1
  • Bull Horns 1 Bone Hood Ornament
  • Bull Horns 2 Bone Hood Ornament
  • Skull Bone Hood Ornament
  • Skull & Crossbones Bone Hood Ornament
  • Bull Horns 1 Silver Hood Ornament
  • Bull Horns 1 Gold Hood Ornament
  • Bull Horns 2 Silver Hood Ornament
  • Bull Horns 2 Gold Hood Ornament
  • Skull Bone Silver Hood Ornament
  • Skull Bone Hood Hood Ornament
  • Skull & Crossbones Silver Hood Ornament
  • Skull & Crossbones Gold Hood Ornament
  • Dead Face Silver Hood Ornament
  • Dead Face Gold Hood Ornament
  • Crosshairs Silver Hood Ornament
  • Crosshairs Gold Hood Ornament
  • Horse War Mask
